notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: NT conceptualized the project, while the rest of the research team supported the planning and implementation of the study. DT, JC, and DAW mobilized the field team and supported the sampling fieldwork and blood collection. KS, ST, MN, and LP supervised the clinical and laboratory work and analyzed the results. DAW drafted the manuscript, while all of the authors have reviewed the final draft and agreed to its publication.
